  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="51411" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="51411" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.12</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="12579">12,579</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1318"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Lost Cherry</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. <b>Lost Cherry</b> was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner. Top notes are Bitter Almond, Black Cherry and Cherry Liqueur; middle notes are Sour Cherry, Plum, Turkish Rose and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Cinnamon, Peru Balsam, Benzoin, Sandalwood, Cloves, Cedar, Patchouli and Vetiver. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>"Tom Ford Lost Cherry is a full-bodied journey into the once-forbidden; a contrasting scent that reveals a tempting dichotomy of playful, candy-like gleam on the outside and luscious flesh on the inside.</p>

<p>Innocence intersects indulgence with an opening that captures the classic perfection of the exotic cherry fruitBlack Cherry's ripe flesh dripping in cherry liqueur glistens with a teasing touch of Bitter Almond.</p>

<p>The heart bursts forth in cherry waves of sweet and tart. Griotte Syrup expresses the textured maceration of voluptuous fruits while breathtaking florals Turkish Rose and Jasmine Sambac penetrate the senses and soul.</p>

<p>Peru Balsam and Roasted Tonka at the drydown suggest a new portrait of an iconic symbol. When blended with an unexpected melange of sandalwood, vetiver and cedar, the finish reaches fantasy-inspiring levels of insatiability."</p>

<p>Top notes: black cherry, cherry liquer, bitter almonds<br />
Heart notes: Griotte syrup, Turkish rose, jasmine Sambac<br />
Base notes: Peru balm, roasted tonka beans, sandalwood, vetiver, cedar</p>

<p>Tom Ford Lost Cherry will be available from November 2018 as 50ml Eau de Parfum and 250ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">92</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Some find it too medicinal or synthetic
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    </div>
                    Not suitable for warm weather

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="51411"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.130.jpg" style="width: 4.275rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Almond-130.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bitter Almond</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.88630790722059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1376.jpg" style="width: 3.225rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Black-Cherry-1376.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Black Cherry</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1471.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cherry-Liqueur-1471.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cherry Liqueur</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.176.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sour-Cherry-176.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sour Cherry</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.171.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Plum-171.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Plum</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75965265410792; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 2.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Turkish Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine Sambac</div></div></div>

            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>FRAGRANTICA BEST PERFUMES 2024  Elena Knezevic &amp; Igor Masyukov</h4>

    </div>

    <span class="badge">12</span>
</div>
<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/21495/news.21495-120x120.jpg" alt="Delphinus and Centaurus by Creed: Two Perspectives on Vanilla" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Delphinus-and-Centaurus-by-Creed-Two-Perspectives-on-Vanilla-21495.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Delphinus and Centaurus by Creed: Two Perspectives on Vanilla</h4>

Update: 7 hours later and the single spritz on my arm is still quite noticeable. That tart cherry scent is just as prominent as when I first sprayed it on! I still can't bring myself to pay for a bottle but in my experience this is a beautiful scent, great performance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2369601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2369601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366154" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joanofarc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="joanofarc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); This is divine. This isn't the same cherry that your middle school chapstick tasted like - this is a deep, sophisticated cherry that you wear with vintage fur coats and black, oversized sunglasses. It's sensual and elegant, with a darkness to it. Phenomenal. Is this overpriced? Absolutely. Would I buy it anyway? Yes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2366154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2366154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's very almond not feel any cherry the almond is very bitter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2365006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2365006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2362272" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362272" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tunzz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487710"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1487710.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tunzz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362272ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362272" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487710">Tunzz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 15:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cherry + baby powder + vaseline. This is NOT beast mode. This is very demure, very mindful. Reminds me of an amaretto sour cocktail. A nice fruity gourmand scent, too bad it lasts all of two seconds. I see this working for people who cannot handle perfume. It is very muted and soft. Personally, I love it. I don't think every perfume needs to be perceived from miles away. However, I do think it is wayyyyy overpriced. But it's also Tom Ford. You're paying for the brand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2362272"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2362272#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356777" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tessture"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tessture" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/I-Profumi-di-Firenze/Acqua-Mirabile-Odorosa-di-Firenze-9765.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9765.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "title="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356777ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356777" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719">tessture</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fine'ry's Not Another Cherry is a very good dupe of this that I like better. Lost Cherry has a great start of fruity, juicy cherry juice that I really love, but as it dries down, it develops a dirty murky note that spoils the melange and makes me want to scrub it off.  Not Another Cherry does the same thing but fails in the dry down to be Lost Cherry.  Just FYI for those who want a cheaper Lost Cherry, or those who like NAC but are looking to plus up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2356777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2356777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354430" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354430" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="L.rist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063466"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1063466.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="L.rist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hiram-Green/Slowdive-47892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Slowdive"title="Slowdive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354430ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354430" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063466">L.rist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 12:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is the price point high? Yes. Is the longetivity great? No. Have I smelled a better, more delicious and well blended cherry note? Also no. This is one of those perfumes I pick up, sigh, give my credit card and wear it with a lot of pleasure. It's simply worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2354430"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2354430#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353139" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Monoi Marianne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327658"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2327658.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Monoi Marianne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327658">Monoi Marianne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know this perfume is very much overpriced and i would never dream of purchasing this for myself due to this factor, however after my gorgeous boyfriend listened to me talk on and on about how incredible i thought this perfume was he gifted it to me for my birthday and let me tell you, this perfume is PERFECT. Yes it is very very sweet as to be expected considering its main notes are almond and cherry. It smells like a bakewell tart (iykyk) so yum but it also smells quite dark and musky when dried with the notes of cloves and cedar. Obviously there is the heavy cherry smell which in my opinion is unmatched. I have spent years searching for a good cherry perfume that isnt too sweet and cake like but not too leather-y and this perfume is just that 10/10 i will be saving the last drops for my wedding day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2353139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2353139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351959" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bregondo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1593456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bregondo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ard-Al-Zaafaran/Al-Dirgham-87214.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87214.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Al Dirgham"title="Al Dirgham"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593456">Bregondo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Deep, dark, mesmerizing, mysterious, sensual, gourmand. Distinct and will surely grab attention. It is not your typical overly-sweet gourmand fragrance; there is this depth, richness, and complexity to Lost Cherry that makes it so sexy and alluring.<br />
<br />
For some reason, when I close my eyes and take a sniff of Lost Cherry, I picture dark blood-red lipstick and red wine.<br />
<br />
This is unisex. I would personally use this a lot for layering on top of other masculine gourmand/ boozy/ tobacco fragrances. Not versatile: strictly for nighttime and cold weather , and best used for special occasions  and definitely date nights. Not a safe blind-buy nor is it safe-to-wear: I feel like this is an acquired taste, and this is not mass-appealing and can be polarizing, I can tell that there will be people out there that will dislike the scent.<br />
<br />
Performance is satisfactory. I like the scent very much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2351959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2351959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152735">SongKi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 03:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is lovely. Realistic cherry and super sweet. It reminds me a lot of YSL's over red, but Lost Cherry is more 'mature'. Overpriced for what it is, but the bottle is so pretty so I blind bought this and I can say I'm happy with it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2348487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2348487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is absolutely beautiful. Every-time  I've worn this I've received compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2342525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2342525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338539" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="47Ronin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="47Ronin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271774">47Ronin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 01:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, so I got this as a gift to a lady in perfume oil version, NOT the alcohol bizarre expensive madness.<br />
<br />
I managed to get a 'test drive' for a whole day and my oh my.<br />
The level of elegance and sophistication with a dash of dirty seductiveness was what I got all through and I was so glad that I was to gift it to a lady.<br />
<br />
People here yapping about the longevity issues with this..hmm.. just not with the pure perfume oil version I bought.<br />
<br />
Infact, I put this on and it stayed on my tshirt for weeks, even at the time of typing this review, I am not about to wash my garment soon.<br />
<br />
Highly a lady evening dinner scent or for those days you feel like getting some dirty sex.<br />
<br />
Oh, and one last thing. If you can get a small perfume oil version and skip the overpriced TF alcoholic version, go for it.<br />
<br />
Like I did. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2338539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2338539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335592" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="micheyll"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1615777"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="micheyll" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); This is by far my favourite fragrance, definitely signature material. I can't, in good conscience, wear this in anything but fall/winter temperatures, though. It works perfectly for a more androgynous vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2335207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2335207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I even let it settle on my skin for a while to see if it got better, but it doesn't. Huge disappointment :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2334213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2334213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333627" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333627" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LibbyLouLee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LibbyLouLee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Confessions-of-A-Rebel/Get-A-Room-Order-Champagne-82500.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82500.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Get A Room & Order Champagne"title="Get A Room & Order Champagne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333627ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333627" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667366">LibbyLouLee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing against Lost Cherry, but it's not verry cherry. The cherry is very underwhelming. For those who want a nice cherry scent, try Cherry Punk by Room 1015. It is a true cherry scent (cherry and leather and done very well) and has good staying power as well as projection. I prefer Cherry Punk, because the cherries are far more prevalent, but also that price. Cherry Punk isn't cheap, but it's not as expensive as Tom Ford.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2333627"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2333627#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333471" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KaroKat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730021"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1730021.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KaroKat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730021">KaroKat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 08:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lost Cherry was and is so overrated. It's an oriental without the oomph. Orientals are as a rule strong scents. Somehow LC is a skin scent with the spices and benzoin. It's ok as a fragrance but my travel size sits virtually untouched for years now. It's not very cherry despite it's name and deep red colored bottle. If this wasn't a Tom Ford I think this would have a remarkably lower rating</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2333471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2333471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332314" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jasonx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8648"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.8648.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jasonx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-Fantasm-93266.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93266.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men Fantasm"title="A*Men Fantasm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8648">jasonx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 05:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty flat &amp; one dimentional. A cherry, almond &amp; vanilla mixture that stay still, no movement. Linear with soft sillage &amp; decent longevity. Easy to wear &amp; easy to like.<br />
I expected a lot more because of the hype but overall it's quite underwhelming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2332314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2332314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331937" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331937" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ismellgoodheaux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2299132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ismellgoodheaux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Elysium-Pour-Homme-Parfum-47480.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47480.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum "title="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331937ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331937" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2299132">Ismellgoodheaux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 17:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first love. a temptress in a red dress thats more than meets the eye. Mysterious boozy dark but gone with the wind. If you can get past the price being extremely high as most Tom ford fragrances are its some beautiful juice. I dont doubt though that if you search you can find something similar at half the cost. It smells like the maraschino cherry soaked in the whiskey of a manhattan if you left it there after an hour and allowed the chilled glass to warm up a tiny bit. This fragrance kickstarted my journey and I will always have a special place for it in my heart but there are other cherries out there and they are equally as seductive. A strong 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2331937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2331937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329652" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Diana Obmetkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2011532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2011532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Diana Obmetkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2011532">Diana Obmetkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 18:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like cherry flavoured candy, and I mean it in the worst way possible. Smells cheap and synthetic, I really don't get the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2329652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2329652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329169" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329169" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="passthecranberrysauce"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="passthecranberrysauce" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-No-2-76532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish No 2"title="Eilish No 2"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329169ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329169" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962746">passthecranberrysauce</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 08:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I understand why someone would enjoy the smell of this scent. It's too cough syrupy for my taste though. I much prefer the cherry note in Electric Cherry. What is unforgivable, is the longevity. This fragrance has no business being this expensive, when the performance is about 3 hours on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2329169"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2329169#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JoyDivision"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JoyDivision" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Blooming-Bouquet-23280.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23280.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet"title="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580180">JoyDivision</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 15:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Fords Lost Cherry is a seductive journey, a daring blend of warmth and intrigue that beckons the wearer to indulge. From the moment it settles on my skin, the dark, luscious cherry accord risesbold and unapologetic, yet refined. Its a boozy embrace, like a well-aged liqueur, warm and enveloping, with a touch of almond that deepens the experience.<br />
<br />
Theres a smoky, almost forbidden quality as it develops, as though youve stumbled upon a secret bar tucked away in a forgotten corner of a city. Hints of vanilla and Peru balsam emerge, adding an irresistible coziness, while the notes of Turkish rose and jasmine subtly dance in the background, lending just the right touch of femininity.<br />
<br />
But this fragrance is no simple gourmand; its far more nuanced. Lost Cherry wears like a cashmere shawl on a crisp evening, cozy yet luxurious, with a seductive edge that hints at mystery and allure. Its a perfume that feels timeless, daring you to reveal the many facets of its warm, smoky depths. If a fragrance could embody a velvet-lined room filled with candlelight and whispers, this would be it. Lost Cherry is indulgence in a bottle, one that makes you feel captivating, powerful, and utterly unforgettable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2328622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2328622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327916" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mrs_ysl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1525750.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mrs_ysl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-46-94033.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94033.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance 46"title="Guidance 46"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327916ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327916" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1525750">Mrs_ysl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 23:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are two favorite fragrances in my collection, they reside in my purse permanently, and one of them is Lost Cherry. If there was an Oscar nomination in perfumers world Louise Turner deserves at least three of those for this absolu masterpiece. Any cherry fragrance that hits the shelfes instantly gets compared to the original, one and only, TF Lost Cherry. Despite the longevity ( which is not too bad if I spray it on my hair), she is the queen! Playful and sexy, alluring and inviting, if I had to take only one bottle with me to the heaven, it would be a hardest choice ever between her and Guidance 46</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2327916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2327916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326549" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShhhDeus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2194368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShhhDeus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194368">ShhhDeus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 16:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its very sexy and elegant scent. Its definitely suitable as a dinner/date scent or for a sexy all black outfit. Great for bitter winters.<br />
<br />
It starts of heavy on the bitter almond with more of a cherry hint. Then slowly develops in to a cherry jam or a cherry liquor. With the most subtle wood<br />
<br />
Overall very sweet, a bit plain. Sexy and really delicious. Wish it had something more</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2326549"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2326549#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This opened me up to the fragrance world and I'm so glad I impulsively bought this because I wanted to smell like a black cherry. My seduction secret weapon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2324415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2324415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322330" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gigigrace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2099085.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gigigrace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322330ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322330" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099085">Gigigrace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 21:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing extra or unnecessary, pure cherry, smells almost edible. If you like cherry and fruity, this is for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2322330"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2322330#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321168" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fresca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1526621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fresca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526621">Fresca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Red, juicy, fresh cherry.  Then, boozy and dark.  And then it's gone.  Total elapsed time: 15 minutes<br />
<br />
I went through my first bottle of Lost Cherry in about two months.  The glass is heavy and opaque so I was completely unaware of how much I was actually spraying to keep that cherry note fresh.  I'm on my third bottle now and I don't use it as much as I did, but I'll probably always have some around.  I've tried other cherry fragrances but I haven't found one yet that quite equals this. <br />
<br />
Even though that bright top note fades, the other notes-- particularly the cinnamon and clove-- last for hours.  It is a beautiful, iconic perfume.  But at TF prices, best to sample before blind buying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2321168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2321168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318961" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wee keavo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wee keavo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814">Wee keavo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 13:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kind of an aggressive cherry but I like it, also quite boozy but not alot tbh.<br />
Also quite almondy like a lot of the Tom Fords.<br />
But if we're being honest nothing special about it but it does smell amazing.<br />
For the price it's like 290 for 50 ml but on discounters its like 120 so don't pay retail.<br />
Also the performance is really not great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2318961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2318961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318572" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshall.D.Peach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2289596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshall.D.Peach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289596">Marshall.D.Peach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a special relationship with this fragrance : I first smelled it when I had no interest whatsoever in the world of perfumery, and it seduced me at first sight. Its aggressive cherry notes took hold of my nose so much that I wanted to bite my wrists as soon as I smelled it on me.<br />
<br />
Because of this experience, I wanted to discover other seductive smells that I could wear, so started digging into the perfumery world and realized just how overrated and overpriced this perfume is. It has a very simple, synthetic composition and doesn't have extraordinary staying power/sillage. So it's not something I'd recommend, I would even recommand you to buy replicas, they have similar staying power (I've tested both) and will save you quite a bit of money.<br />
<br />
It's a good cherry perfume, original at first glance, sweet, which has earned me quite a few compliments. This fragrance also has an advantage: it blends very well in layering with quite a few other fruity fragrances, notably coconut or vanilla, but it clearly doesn't deserve all that money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2318572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2318572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317592" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317592" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dolcecara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276794"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dolcecara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317592ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317592" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276794">dolcecara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 08:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A cherry frangipane tart in a bottle.  The mixture of cherry &amp; almond is so divine.  I didn't want to love this perfume as much as I did because of its price, but, it really is the most incredible cherry perfume I've ever smelled.  Which is funny considering this caught my interest when someone described it as reminiscent of embalming fluid/a freshly embalmed body.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="51411"comment_id="2317592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html?ccid=2317592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
